1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah the wife of the Prophet said:"When the two circumcised parts meet, then bath is obligatory. The Messenger of Allah and I did that, and we bathed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وُجُوبِ الْغُسْلِ مِنَ الْتِقَاءِ الْخِتَانَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about the obligation of bath when the two circumcised parts meet
